summary:
A highly-motivated and innovative professional in cross-border eCommerce covering retail, supply chain and (return)logistics. With an extensive experience in leading and managing various teams responsible for International Sales, Marketing and Business Development.

In recent years developed a strong expertise in Chinese cross-border eCommerce market.
Creating value by connecting ‘the right dots’ developing various new business models, propositions and partnerships.

Truly entrepreneurial with a strong drive for ‘getting things actually done’, using a methodology based on bold experimentation and rapid iteration. This in line with the saying of one great Chinese philosopher: "A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step” (Lao Tzu).

treasury_media:
[{'url': None, 'title': "OriginalBabyBrands, officially endorsed by Nutrica&PostNL (Nov '16)", 'description': 'OriginalbabyBrands.com is a one-stop service for (mostly Chinese) buyers in the Netherands to purchase Nutrilon products for their family and friends in China. Original Baby Brands is officially endorsed by Nutricia and PostNL.
It offers authentic Nutrilon products by direct sourcing from Nutricia with the best available expiration date and free shipping to China which is shipped by PostNL and its network.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C562DAQE53ox4S69llA/profile-treasury-image-shrink_8192_8192/0/1601710509228?e=1692939600&v=beta&t=pcsNwmHsREkzG5VIiJeLPCVVyz7e8ZpQpD-ucD3ukFA'}, {'url': None, 'title': "Alibaba E-Trade Mission (March '17)", 'description': 'Alibaba Benelux on March 16th and 17th together with its partners StartupDelta, Rabobank China and a delegation from Belgium government will host the E-Trade Mission at the Alibaba campus in Hangzhou.
StartupEnvoy HRH Prins Constantijn will lead the Dutch delegation. The objective of the E-Trade Mission for Alibaba is to introduce its e-Commerce services and the commercial opportunities to Dutch and Belgium participants.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C562DAQG4DbB2xfhj7g/profile-treasury-image-shrink_8192_8192/0/1598991174428?e=1692939600&v=beta&t=cma4-RK1hnlXBoPatishEwYtowwb3a9l6EBhYfq1oL8'}, {'url': None, 'title': "DeliverDutch a PostNL initiative (January '18)", 'description': 'Je pakketten betrouwbaar, voordelig en makkelijk naar China sturen? 
Met Deliver Dutch doe je het helemaal zelf.

Pakketten snel en veilig naar China sturen was nog nooit zo makkelijk. Op Deliverdutch.nl kun je voortaan zelf je verzendlabels printen, online betalen ook met Chinese betaalmethodes, je pakket verzendklaar maken en deze afgeven op een PostNL-locatie bij jou in de buurt. En heb je hulp nodig? Onze Chineestalige klantenservice helpt je graag verder. (https://www.deliverdutch.nl/nl/)', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C562DAQF5QEUCTCC_-Q/profile-treasury-image-shrink_8192_8192/0/1602462395929?e=1692939600&v=beta&t=LtM9ELbAoaHvxlF--O4ZJrVxzxSU91c6dn3s9OAqRIU'}]
